community.name: Local Police Department
community.description:
Welcome the LPD, one of VRChats oldest and largest roleplaying groups bringing entertainment to public lobbies since 2018. The LPD hosts daily VRChat events where officers are assigned to a squad to create roleplay scenarios in public lobbies, themed around interactions with the public and emergency services. Due to the nature of improv, anything can happen during these events. From drug busts and shootouts, to checking mirror dwelling licenses. 

To join the LPD check out the recruitment channel on our Discord at <color=#7289daff>discord.gg/lpd</color>. There you will find the application form as well as our handbook which is packed with all kinds of important information. Once accepted you will go through cadet training, before jumping into patrolling VRChat as an official LPD officer. When you have some experience under your belt you can take additional training to move up the ranks or specialize into other kinds of roleplay that we offer.

Patrol officers will arrest people and bring them to the LPD station to take their mugshot that then gets posted on our discord server for everyone to see. If they choose to not come quietly we have our swat team, known as SLRT, to help persuade them. Once the suspect has been processed they will be handed over to our Corrections Officers and given a nice new home in the LPD Prison with all the other prisoners. And if anyone gets hurt in the process they can be treated by the LMT at our Hospital. To find out how you can help keep the streets of VRChat safe, join our Discord or follow us on Twitter @LPD_vr.

community.name: The Bakery
community.description: The Bakery is a group of artists that primarily focus on digital art, 3d animation, and virtual reality environments, primarily based in VRChat. We enjoy creating stories with our art, and giving people something to enjoy!

community.description:
Welcome to the Noved Squadǃ 

Home of the Noved Notes Podcastǃ
A VRChat Podcast that goes into the amazing creators of VRChatǃ

In the Noved Squad Community‚ we do a bunch of hangouts‚ game nights‚ DJ Noved Party Nights‚ and collaborate to make amazing creations on VRChatǃ Overall we just like to have funǃ

If you are a creator ⁄ community rep that is interested in being on the podcast‚ join the discord and submit an applicationǃ

community.name: LAB Unit

We host private roleplay events, joint operations, contracts with other mil-sim/roleplay communities, and handle everything from basic security to existential threats.

community.name: Megabuilding 325
community.description:
Do you make anything? Music, painting, textures, 3D, 2D, animations, sculptures, etc ? Do you open for commissions? Do you also roleplay? Do you wish you had a virtual store? Do I have your attention yet? Then you should consider joining MEGABUILDING 325!

M325 is a cyberpunk inspired roleplay group. If you enjoy stuff like Ghost in the Shell, Blade Runner, Apex, Titanfall, Akira, The Finals, Cyberpunk and more, then you'll fit right in! We offer creators of all kinds a place to hold a store (no Unity knowledge needed) and do some roleplay with a map that evolves with the players! 

Not a creator? Not a problem! Just come RP, join the guild, run missions and more! Found something cool in a mission? We'll add it to the map! That's right, what you do truly impacts the map here at M325.  Lobbies are every Tuesdays at 7:30 pm eastern. We are also Quest tolerant (Questies be warned, we do not impose players to have Quest avatars. Use your imagination, buddy.)

community.name: The Necron Empire

The Necron Empire is a VRChat based Avatar PvP group‚ we use these Avatars to fight Duells all the way to 40 people Battles with the Theme being from Warhammer 40k․ （Dark Sci-Fi）

We enjoy a loose culture in our group and encourage a good‚ fun but semi serious attitude․

Due to how our system works we are a PC only community

community.name: 1st Weimar Republic
community.description:
Welcome to the 1st Weimar Republic!

We’re an alternate history VRChat roleplay group based around 1920's Interwar Germany.

We host weekly immersive RP events in the Weimar Republic;
Daily Life of Soldiers
Combat RP
Military Training
Ceremonies

From fighting in the street and countryside against uprisings to simply living out the daily life of a soldier, our events tell an ongoing narrative influenced by all of our members. Want to know more? If Immersive RP, Alt-History or History, and an interesting story appeal to you, then the 1st Weimar Republic is the place for you!

https://discord.gg/ZMP49H3zSY

Join now, become part of our growing community, and leave your mark upon the Republic!

community.name: Ezyne Planetarium
community.description: Welcome to the Ezyne Planetarium, the home of all things Ezyne and more! From Gaming to Music to General Small Talk, the Planetarium has a place for you. With the addition of Monthly Hosted Events which vary from Challenging Games, Fan Meetups or even simple Music Jamming Raves, there's sure to be something to your comfort. As a community founded upon a Jack-of-all-Trades Music Producer, Graphic Designer, Videographer, etc; we welcome your passions with open arms and invite you to share your dreams. So relax, make yourself at home, and welcome to the orbit~

community.name: The Grey Knights 40k PVP
community.description:
We are The Grey Knights PVP Group. We have multiple PVP events every week where our group battles other PVP groups in VRChat using a functional avatar based PVP System. We are based on the Grey Knight faction from 40k who are a mysterious Space Marine chapter who are specialized in fighting demons. With all Grey Knights being psykers, we have a verity of different play styles, all in a sci-fi knightly order.
“I am the hammer, I am the right hand of the Emperor, the instrument of his will, the gauntlet about his fist, the tip of his spear, the edge of his sword!”

community.name: Phoenix Academy
community.description:
Phoenix Academy is a VR language learning group, At Phoenix Academy, we are committed to providing you with an immersive English language learning experience through role-playing situations. Our goal is for you, the students, to speak English in a safe and encouraging environment for all ages.

Our students have the opportunity to interact with native English speakers who are here to help and motivate them to practice and improve their language skills.

Classes take place every other Wednesday, but we are working to increase the frequency and offer even more learning opportunities.

Join us at Phoenix Academy and discover how learning English can be exciting, challenging, and fun. We look forward to seeing your progress and success on this linguistic journey!

community.name: Metropolitan Police Service
community.description: We're a friendly police RP community, who patrol worlds of VRChat. As you can see, we have been heavily influenced by the real UK Met Police, which is of course our inspiration, and what we have based our department on.

We are a Vietnam war era sever （1972）

We strive to keep the Ture knowledge and teachings of the marines

Join for Events‚ PVP‚ Drill ‚ RP‚ Tanks‚ Helicopters And more

13＋ do to T․O․S

Owner- ~Juns~

The Marine Corps is a tough and dedicated branch of the U․S․ military․ They're always ready to protect and defend their country․ They have a proud history of serving in conflicts worldwide․ Semper Fiǃ"

members.username: The US Marine Corps of the 1970's

community.name: United Republic
community.description: The United Republic is a multi-purpose PVP community and social hub, One of the oldest and still running PvP Star wars Communities on VR Chat. Events are hosted regularly by the week, participating in world hops, PVP matches with other Avatar PvP communities, Different types of Light RP, Large Scale Re-Created battles and more. Our leadership team is friendly and active with a large player base and many regulars. We welcome any and all to participate and enjoy the community we've grown!

Our signature event is Thursday Games, a 2-hour gaming session in VRChat held every Thursday at 6pm USA EST. We host and play various games outside of VRChat and encourage participation in major events throughout VRChat and other gaming communities. All members are invited to host their own gaming or social event. Time to rock and roll!

community.name: AWMC Industries
community.description:
Step into the boundless universe of the Allied Waifu Military Core Industries also known as AI‚ your premier universewide military arms dealerǃ
Set in the spacefaring era of the year 2200＋‚ AWMC Industries stands as a beacon of innovation in the vast expanse of space․

When Earth fell victim to an unknown extraterrestrial force during the chaos of the Third World War‚ advanced weaponry‚ including machine soldiers powered by artificial intelligence‚ clashed in a desperate bid for survival․ Amidst the devastation‚ these androids emerged‚ alerting humanity to the imminent threat approaching earth․
Despite the warnings‚ blinded by greed‚ many humans ignored the approaching catastrophe․ Until it was too late․
A select few androids and humans escaped Earth's demise‚ vowing to safeguard humanity's legacy and principles․ Thus‚ they founded a military dedicated to preserving these ideals‚ recognizing that a formidable arsenal is the way of survival․
Emerging as a prominent arms manufacturer and formidable military force‚ AI stands as a beacon of strength and integrity‚ its vast fleet traversing the galaxies to uphold its values․

Whether you're a seasoned spacefarer or a green recruit‚ AI welcomes all to forge the destiny of galaxies․ Enlist today and be the bastion of humanitys legacy․

Caution˸ Enlisting requires disposal of your biological embodiment․

community.name: Ookami Collective

community.name: The Goblin Cave
community.description: The Goblin Cave is a welcoming 'café' community ran by me!! MadzLvsBblz. Overrun by the most vibrant of lofi based goblins that was nearly destroyed by a multi-verse attack, The Goblin Café welcomes all kinds of people as we serve chaos, goblin vibes and full on positivity.

community.name: Kochō no Yakuza
community.description:
We are a roleplay VRChat community themed after the Yakuza game series and Japanese culture in general. We wish to provide, bring together and entertain. 

Providing a friendlier place for VRChat public to roleplay in is one of the aims we wish to achieve, alongside with helping other communities with bigger projects.

Bringing together both new and veteran players who have nowhere else to go, educate people about VRChat as a whole and keeping them up to date on what is going on in this vast but confusing place.

Entertaining both the public and our own people with external and internal roleplay which are still in development. Giving people a place to feel welcomed and a place anybody can feel they belong to.

community.name: VRDancing
community.description:
"VRDancing is a beginner-friendly community of dancers that host weekly dance, fitness and hangout events in EU and NA timezones. We welcome any dancer! 

No Full Body Tracking required, some even join without VR! 

Whether you just started and lack confidence, or are a veteran dancer with years of IRL experience, we hope you'll find your place here! 

Our main dancing events are accessible to any skill level and are an excellent place to start dancing in VRChat! "

community.name: Death Korps of VR
community.description: Established in 2019, the Death Korps of VR is a Avatar PVP / Role play group dedicated to the Death Korps of Krieg Regiment of the Astra Militarum in the Warhammer 40,000 Universe. The Kriegsmen of the Death Korps are steadfast soldiers of the Imperium of Man. They grind down their enemies with attrition, artillery, and zeal. Got what it takes to join the Korp? Jump in the trench line and charge forward for the emperor, shovel ,bayonet, and lasgun in hand.

community.name: Ancients of VRChat
community.description: Ancients of VRChat is a server with over 17‚000 members for finding other adults to be friends with․ We host dozens of events of all varieties every week including 3 that are oriented toward getting new members involved․  Hangouts‚ Games‚ A Club‚ Workouts‚ Book Club‚ Watch Parties and more․

community.name: Beast Fitness

community.name: DalekHQ
community.description: Welcome to the Dalek HQ, the Go-to Doctor Who Fan  Community of VRChat. There is something for everyone in this community, wether you like to RP as a Dalek  or Doctor Who Character in-game, Show of your tactical prowess in  PvP, exercise your artistic side  in our discord Competitions, or show your devotion to the empire and work your way up the ranks.

community.name: Study-Japanese【 JapaNichijou ジャパ日常 】
community.description:
Our community is made up of people who have come together with the goal of enjoying learning Japanese.  
We host events twice every weekend, where we explore various ways to practice Japanese, including Japanese lessons, games using Japanese Language, and role-playing events that simulate real-life communication.  
If you're interested in Japanese Language or Japanese culture, feel free to stop by and join us! ありがとう！

community.name: Stuck at Home Con (SAHCon - The Official Homestuck Con)
Paranormal Scene Investigators
community.description:
Paranormal Scene Investigators is a roleplay group focused on the paranormal and unknown. We have weekly events where we delve into the eldritch, the paranormal and the unknown of the VR world

From vampires and cryptids
To Ghosts and Spirits.
To Technological nightmares and cults....
To much much more.

We are our own original universe based on paranormal legends and folktales throughout the world

Some of our events will use D20 to act out some of our roleplay. We are light hearted but most importantly fun!
We are PC and Quest compatible. We lean a bit more towards PC with special effects but try our best to accommodate Quest users.
Come check us out!

Started out small on Twitch, followed by YouTube 1-2 years later. She is also representing Wave 2 of Okimi Cafe since October 2022. You may also know her as a Werehog Simp in certain streams from time to time. If you wanted to see some comfy, cozy vibes, along with some chaos into the mix, you're in for a treat!!! I hope you'll enjoy your stayǃǃǃ Stay tuned and stay cozy~ǃǃǃǃ

Omega is also a server for creators to showcase their craft, may it be Video/Audio Production, Avatar/World Creation, and many more!

community.description:
Welcome to Tuatha Dé Danann, a community which revolves around a hidden society of mages and their many associates‚ all of which have evaded the ever-watching eyes of a world ruled by corrupt Megacorps․

We'll be offering a variety of fun and unique activities for our members‚ such as story-based events‚ hangouts‚ game nights‚ and many moreǃ It should also be mentioned that the Tuatha Dé Danann isn't just for members of our community‚ but also for friends and and people looking to have funǃ If you're still reading this‚ then we've probably caught your interest․ Perhaps continue and see what else is in store?

community.description: We're an annual talent show held over three nights that gives performers a spotlight to showcase their talents, connect with a vibrant community, and compete for real cash prizes.

community.name: Salamanders Chapter PC PVP
community.description: Do you enjoy fighting for the Emperor of Mankind, flamers, and saving the innocent citizens of the Imperium? Then the Salamanders are just for you! Our times are European friendly, from 5PM EST to 6PM EST. If you enjoy Warhammer40k, give us a try!

community.description: Hidden Reality specializes in hosting mind-blowing virtual raves that redefine the traditional club experince. Our community thrives on innovation, constantly seeking to enhance the virtual experience for all members.

community.name: Sunset Plaza
community.description: Sunset Plaza, is an 18+ mall community dedicated to fun and social engagement. Attend our weekly events, unwind with a drink, and find your perfect shop. Verification is mandatory to maintain a welcoming and respectful space shop.

community.name: Blue Star
community.description:
"We are a role-playing community inspired by games and media such as the SCP wiki, Lobotomy Corporation and Blue Archive.

In our role-playing group, our members are part of Blue Star, a security and research company that conducts research and experiments on abnormal objects and physical manifestations, that artificially aren't possible.
We operate under-ground, seeming to be just an ordinary security facility on the surface. While researching and containing abnormalities to protect the public. Preserving artifacts, and getting to abnormalities first before other organizations can do so, preventing them from being exploited. We use Rifts, in addition as well, to move our personnel to other parts of the multi-verse."

community.description: We are a beginner and quest friendly Roleplay group set with former RoosterTeeth universe of RWBY.

community.description: We are a community of Hispanic creators that gets together to help and share knowledge about worlds, avatars and general content for VRChat. We have regular events on Sundays and our big event called "Forjaversario" where we celebrate the anniversary of our community.

community.description: Group of professional furries working in STEMM fields (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, Medical). We hangout in VR and organize on Discord! Check out some of the techiest nerds you'll meet on VRchat!

community.description: a PVP/RP Group based within the Destiny Franchise.

community.description: We roleplay as cannon characters or original characters in various fandoms

community.name: The Virtual Gauntlet
community.description: The Virtual Gauntlet is a VR game show hosted in VRChat where two teams of four compete in fast-paced, skill-based obstacle course challenges. The show runs in seasons with a strong cyberpunk theme and features unique games like Dodge Wall, Rift Rush, and Grid Lock. We record and stream the matches, promote the teams involved, and offer in-world prizes like trophies and group shoutouts. It's built to spotlight player communities, bring hype energy to VR gaming, and create something exciting for both players and viewers.

community.name: CozyCon Online
community.description: CozyCon is a free yearly multi-fandom virtual convention on Discord/VRChat/Twitch that runs in September, but also hosts monthly events. We have skilled vendors, DJs and Panelists every year, sweet themed merch designed by our artists, and year-round community space to chat, organize games, share your creative works and much more.

community.name: The Ashen Empire
community.description:
The Ashen empire is a Star wars inspired avatar PvP PC and Quest community. 
We engage in several different forms of combat such as TDM, FFA, hostage rescue, boss battles and many more. We also play games outside of PvP events in both vrchat and other games. We host events most days between 4pm EST and 8pm EST.

community.name: ValenVRC
community.description: I'm a freelancer developer and vrchat mapmaker from Argentina, I specialize in the creation of assets and systems that use U#!

community.name: Fluffy Snakes
community.description:
"A cozy place for all ankle biters‚ big or small‚ to chill‚ hang out‚ and feel at home․

We're here to make sure you have a safe and fun experience with COOKIES includedǃ

Our mission? Nibble some ankles and brighten your dayǃ

Everyone is welcome‚ but watch out your ankles might be at riskǃ We're all about cuddles‚ chats‚ and good vibes․

Our spaces are moderated to ensure you have the best experience possible․ Come join us and let's make memories togetherǃ"

community.name: Galactic Clone Army Refuge
community.description: Clone Wars Milsim done right․ A place to leave behind the drama‚ the baggage‚ and all the other issues we're all tired from․ Its time to set down all that weight‚ and find a home in the Refuge․ Rejoice and Fight on!

community.name: The Warp
community.description: Based on EVE Online and Dust 514, the worlds I create are tailored more towards hosting club events and are open to all other groups who like to host any event at these worlds. The Warp is the primary group that hosts its own events and is where I showcase my works at.

community.name: Viral Hit
community.description:
The story begins in the world of Viral Hit‚ where content creators‚ YouTubers‚ and streamers use their fame and influence to bully those without ＂clout․＂ The character I play was one of their victims until he decided he'd had enough․ He started streaming himself fighting back against these bullies‚ learning real-world combat techniques along the way․

Over time‚ he formed a group with like-minded individuals‚ but they eventually lost contact when the world underwent a massive change․ Gates began opening‚ people were assigned ranks‚ and individuals from other worlds arrived with their own abilities․ Gods intervened‚ stealing‚ replacing‚ and altering things across different realities․ In the chaos‚ a God blinded his sister and took his family from him․ Many of the original members of Viral Hit also went missing․
Determined to find his friends and family‚ he became a hunter․

community.name: Hidden Haven
community.description: A Sci-Fantasy themed Metaverse Roleplay group with origin roots in things like Starbound

community.name: Weaboo Weekend
community.description: Weaboo Weekend is a free-to-attend annual music festival celebrating the vibrant worlds of anime, comics, and video games. Our mission is to deliver an unforgettable, immersive experience for fans and enthusiasts alike. Our mission is to an experience that stands apart from anything else on the platform. At the same time, we are dedicated to raising funds for charity. Backed by a passionate and experienced team, along with the support of collaborating communities, we are committed to providing a high-quality event that both entertains and shines a light on charity.

community.name: Pony's Barn
community.description: This is a community of horse lovers alike! For both PVP RolePlay, and Games together! We Strive For Making Horse Characters As Models & Story :D

community.name: Alterview
community.description: A film studio that specializes in VR filmmaking.

community.name: SkyeSage Creations
community.description: My specialty is in cinematic storytelling, aiming to transport audiences to new worlds existing solely in the realm of imagination. I find inspiration from the underground dance and particle animation communities, and my goal is to create experiences that not only break new ground, but also evoke powerful emotions in those who engage in them.

community.name: Waifuwehr
community.description: We are the Waifuwehr! VRChat's oldest still surviving Military RP community founded back in 2017. The community aims to offer a realistic, dynamic, and educational military experience to those belonging to cultures worldwide, all connected under one organization, regardless of one’s personal background.

community.name: RWBY Journey Beyond Remnant
community.description:
RWBY JBR is a Canon multi-crossover AU VRC RP that has a wide variety of characters from a variety of different series and franchises that come together in one place.

The focus of the roleplay will be on exploring the different plot points of each season, delving into the perspectives of each character. It's worth noting that certain significant details might undergo alterations, like the demise of a character or a shift in the timeline of events. As seasons unfolds, we'll remain engaged in the otherworldly realm or dimension we find ourselves in. Throughout the replay, the choices you make will shape your character, highlighting both your strengths and weaknesses. Moreover, your decisions will also have a direct impact on the overall narrative of the story

community.name: Izanagi Academy
community.description: a roleplay group focusing on a magical academy in VRChat

community.name: The Dark Angels 40k PVP
community.description: We are the honored 1st Legion, more commonly known as the Dark Angels Chapter. We are one of the space marine groups within the 40k hub, and are always looking for new members to join our ranks. We have a wide variety of models that suit all playstyles. Whether you like to be up close and personal with melee, or laying down heavy fire with a powerful gun we have a model for you. While we do take part in combat events multiple times a week, we also do occasionally host various events outside of VRChat. These include game nights on deathwing and darktide and even jackbox game nights.

community.name: The Mighty Gym
community.description: The Mighty Gym is the ultimate social fitness experience in VRǃ Join us for group classes of up to 30 people‚ lead by real certified instructors‚ where you can test your fitness skills in one of our 9 themed workouts․ With technology to track your form‚ and give you a score for your performance‚ you can be sure to hit your fitness goals and have loads of fun with your friends every timeǃ

community.name: Academy for Good and Evil "A.G.E"
community.description:
We are an 18+ VRChat roleplay community where heroes and villains are forged. Our immersive roleplay focuses on shaping students' talents and imagination, preparing them to embark on their own personal conquests—whether for justice or chaos.

If you love crafting unique characters, developing rich lore, and bringing your creations to life in VRChat, you’ve found the right place.

community.name: Mythos Makers
community.description: Mythos Makers is a general entertainment and online media content creation site featuring several storytellers and creators with several backgrounds including Comic Writing and Drawing, General Writing, Video Game Development, Video Creation, Podcast Creation, and so on so forth.

community.name: TrueAquaPsych's Complex
community.description: A group for VRChat puzzle solving enthusiasts.

community.name: The Great Religion
community.description: We are avid pug goers, and also we are home to Celeste-AI!

community.name: Virtual Relics
community.description: a cozy‚ 18＋SFW VRChat community based in Europe‚ perfect for both newcomers and returning players alike․ We offer a laid-back‚ friendly environment where you can enjoy a variety of activities - whether its weekly game nights‚ movie nights‚ parties‚ or even spontaneous events․ From small‚ intimate meetups to larger gatherings‚ theres always something for everyone․ If you're looking for a fun‚ relaxed space to connect and unwind with others in VRChat‚ youll feel right at home here․

community.name: SCP Foundation of VR
community.description: The SCP Foundation of VRChat is a roleplay community inspired by the SCP universe. We utilize our own content and lore to keep things new and engaging. Players can create their own characters, anomalies and stories and have it all played out in our weekly events.

community.name: Virtualis Res Online Film Festival
community.description: A virtual film festival spanning two weeks promoting various art forms within VRChat, from films to photography to music.

community.name: Anime Ships United
community.description:
The Anime Ships United (ASU) are a group of shipgirl fans come together to enjoy sharing and talking about warships and shipgirls from all fandoms.
We also do weekly game nights along with random RP moments.
Over all we are a chill hangout group for the most part, though if folks want to be more RP engaged we also have the United Shipgirl Navy (USN) which is a more RP focused sub-group and just getting its feet wet, the USN will be doing weekly RP events and has a dedicated tabletop game that the members play weekly.
If you like or love ships or interested in all things boat and shipgirl then come join the navy!

community.name: Virtual FurMix
community.description: Virtual FurMix is a virtual reality experience that takes place on VRChat. It was born from the dream of the Brazilian Furry community to have a place to call their own, where we seek to celebrate the fandom by getting together and having fun. The event takes place with the presence of our fandom DJs that mark the soundtrack of this unforgettable night.

community.name: EraiShukai_今日も一日生き延びてえらい！集会
community.description: 「今日もお疲れ様！生き延びてえらい！」という言葉を合言葉に一日の終わりに開催する「おかえり」が待っている集会です。

members.username: 今日も一日生き延びてえらい！集会

community.name: Team Nakama Vibes
community.description: The Official Home of The Self-Employed Idiots™ - A group of “semi-functional” homies out on a mission to spread some good vibes.

community.name: NanoBunTV
community.description: 🥕 Professional Idiot Robo-Bunny from the virtual world! 🥕 Jack of all trades, master of... maybe a few (but it's all too much to fit into this little bio)

community.name: Chimkins
community.description:
We are a small team working on VRChat worlds and planning to release more in the future. Our main goal is to make a world that is fun to play and great for hanging out with friends.

We currently have 3 worlds released publicly:
- Zombie Survival
- The Hunt
- Deagle Duel

community.name: Kookie Music Enjoyers
community.description: Fan group for the artist Kookie, who makes hyperpop adjacent pop music with a focus on lyrical content.

community.name: The WAWWA Hut
community.description: The WAWWA Hut is a community that is open for people from any walk of life. We are a place for encouragement and inspiration. At the end of the day the culture in which we live doesn't share enough of the positivity towards one another so we do the best we can to lift others up when they are down and inspire everyone to pursue whatever it is they want to pursue in life. We have a decent sized gaming community, a music community and a few other sub communities.

community.name: Hanami Enjoyers
community.description: A community centered around the worlds and creations of Reth Sogen.

community.name: Ultimate Alliance VR
community.description: A roleplay group set in the world of comic books inspired by the Marvel Ultimate Alliance series.

community.name: No Friends Friends Club
community.description: A social group and gathering that focuses on helping people struggling with social anxiety to come out and practice social skills while making friends along the way.

community.name: Zekk's Shaders and Support
community.description: A place to discuss all details about Zekk shaders and prefabs, as well as any other general Unity questions!

community.name: Onix Angel Creations
community.description: A SFW and LGBTQIA＋ community for meeting people‚ making friends‚ creating art and exploring interests

community.name: Neon Nexus
community.description: Neon Nexus is a VTuber Mixer event for VTubers by VTubers

community.name: The Blood Ravens
community.description: The Blood Ravens are a multi-purpose PVP community and social hub, One of the oldest still running Warhammer Community on VR Chat. Events are hosted regularly by the week, participating in world hops, PVP matches with other Warhammer communities, Laserdome tournaments, game nights, and more. Our leadership team is friendly and active with a large playerbase and many regulars. We welcome any and all to participate and enjoy the community we've grown.

community.name: Galaxy Fleet Command
community.description: Galaxy Fleet Command is a group of Star Trek enthusiasts in locations scattered around planet earth, who have taken up virtual residence in SecondLife and VRChat. It is here, in this virtual world where we come to live, work and play out our roles as Star Fleet Officers, Shuttle Pilots, Academy Instructors, Engineers, Medical personnel, and various other functions.

community.name: Baobab Crossing
community.description: Baobab Crossing delivers Blooming Moments—a celebration of fleeting encounters, cherished connections, and music that resonates beyond the moment.

community.name: Ministry Promotions
community.description: Aproffessional & strategic option for vr event logistics an promotions

community.name: Rindo Cult
community.description: Built upon a foundation of love towards the Rindo base model (By Jingo Channel), Rindo cult is a fusion blend of cultures and bases, proud to offer a place of unity and joy to all. Whether you seek intellectual discussions, artistic collaborations, or simply a space to unwind and let loose, Rindo Cult offers it all. With events that span across all time zones of the world Rindo *Not-A-Cult* welcomes you with open arms, no matter your affinity!

community.name: El Alba
community.description: Bilingual (Spanish-English) VRChat community dedicated to providing a safe and welcoming environment to enjoy all that the game and its people have to offer.

community.name: The Faceless
community.description: The Faceless, founded by the Blind Prophet, serves the Many-Faced God by fostering balance—introducing chaos where needed and peace where there's excess chaos. Our 18+ community, based in the VRUnderground Oasis, operates The Temple, a free online educational and community center. We offer a wide range of courses and events, including arts, sciences, technology, music, dance, wellness, gaming, and cultural history, with many more subjects available.

community.name: VRelium
community.description:
VRelium is a dynamic and inclusive community within VRChat‚ built around a shared passion for music and creativity․ We are dedicated to supporting and showcasing the talents of virtual artists‚ DJs‚ and performers‚ providing a platform for them to connect with audiences and share their craft in meaningful ways.

At the heart of VRelium is the belief that music has the power to bring people together‚ and we aim to create unforgettable experiences that inspire connection and collaboration․ Through our events‚ we celebrate the diverse and ever-evolving virtual music scene‚ from intimate performances to large-scale festivals․


Charity is a key part of what we do‚ as we believe in using our platform to make a positive impact․ By hosting charity-focused festivals‚ we bring the community together to support important causes and demonstrate the potential of VR to create real-world change․


VRelium is more than just a place for music, its a space for building friendships‚ exploring creativity‚ and shaping the future of VR entertainment․ 

Whether youre an artist‚ a performer‚ or someone who simply loves music‚ VRelium is a welcoming space where you can be part of something bigger

community.name: Kudalyn's Creations
community.description: Hi! I'm Kuda, and I make customizable furry models for VRChat, along with various clothing and other accessories for them. I also host once a month meetups for my avatar community , so folks can show off what they've been working on, and bring their friends along to chill!

community.name: Fort Victoria Recruitment Base
community.description: Fort Victoria offers a military base for groups seeking to recruit and hold military events․ This map was built specifically for VRChat Mil-Sim communities and the general public‚ likewise․

community.name: ARK Station VRChat Avatar PVP
community.description: ARK Station is a VRChat Community HUB Based on Creativity, Interaction, and Having Fun. We aim to create a server/environment for people to relax, enjoy, or just hang out after a long day of Work, School, or Life. While also focusing on being able to interact with your friends on a whole new level. Providing a place where you can download Prefabs based on this idea of interaction. Letting Players Create their Avatars or Worlds And using them in our Events. We aim to push the limits of what VRChat can be, not only the things we create but each other. We are a VRChat community HUB, and all communities are welcome.

community.name: Togare Termini
community.description:
Togare Termini is a Metaverse Roleplay Lobby set in a Train Station. 
Stop in with a connecting tram as you travel across the Metaverse, or stay a long while to visit our shops and learn about our in-house lore. We are Beginner friendly & Horror coded - Goofs, Gaffs, and Slice-of-Life welcome.

community.name: Projekt G.A.T.E
community.description:
Projekt G.A.T.E is based off the anime/manga called, "Jieitai Kanochi Nite, Kaku Tatakaeri or GATE: Thus, the Japanese Self-Defense Force Fought There."

We carry loadouts that the JSDF uses in the anime/manga with slow progression towards modern loadouts."

community.name: VI Legion
community.description: A Warhammer PVP/Chill

community.name: Eliteiment's Worldtopia
community.description: A community of game world enthusiasts revolving around Eliteiment's creations.

community.name: Subsystem Virtual Events
community.description:
Subsystem is at the forefront of european virtual raves, offering immersive experiences that redefine electronic music events and push the boundaries of VRChat's capabilities. By merging cutting-edge production with pulsating electronic music, Subsystem invites music lovers to an unparalleled journey into digital bliss from anywhere around the world. 
It's the ultimate destination for those seeking a unique and unforgettable rave experience.

community.name: Osiris Division
community.description: A group of Titanfall fans recreating the iconic franchise in VR through large scale events, Roleplay, and content creation.

community.name: Skulls Nightshade - Afterlife
community.description: The Afterlife Official VR Chat Community - Lead by VTuber ＆ Event Host Skulls Nightshade

community.name: Refraction VR
community.description: Refraction VR is a moderated public VRChat group dedicated to providing a safe and inclusive space for LGBTQ+ individuals and allies. We offer a welcoming community where members can connect, express themselves, and find support within the virtual world of VRChat. Come check out our daily instances and weekly events!

community.name: Mosaic
community.description: Mosaic is a place for creators of all kinds to connect, collaborate, and elevate their craft. Whether you want to promote yourself, participate in creative projects, or help communities with media content, there’s a role for you here.

community.name: The Mandalorian Covert of VRC
community.description: The Mandalorian Covert of VRChat is a casual Milsim/Roleplay community focusing on the Mandalorian from Star Wars, with active event hosts, and many avatars/worlds made by our own dev team.

community.name: Bossun's Gladiators
community.description: Workout Crew focused on improving wellbeing.

community.name: Mugoobers
community.description: VRChat Cafe and social community serving coffees and providing good vibes for players to meet new friends

community.name: Skits'N'Bits
community.description: We're a creative‚ fun‚ and welcoming improv community offering weekly workshops for all skill levels 18 and older and serve as a hub for skits‚ sketches, projects‚ and other VR performative collabsǃ

community.name: Traveling Circus
community.description: A group of people who like to entertain as well as a place for those interested in becoming an audience member who's applicable to receive such entertainment! If either of these is true The Circus is for you!

community.name: Dream Tree Cafe
community.description: a RP community based in a café where people form all over, new and veterans to RP can come by and have fun

community.name: Sonic Speed Network
community.description:
You just found the FASTEST channel on YouTube.
Welcome to Sonic Speed Network — home of Sonic The VTuber, where the news is fresh, the takes are hot, and the gameplay? Absolutely UNHINGED. 

New Sonic drops? We’re on it.
Gameplay? Speedrun vibes only.
Discussions? Chaotic, loud, and full of ring energy.
Memes, moments, and maybe a meltdown or two.

This ain’t just a channel — it’s a Zone.
Subscribe and join the Speedster Family, or get left in the loop-de-loop.
Let’s make some noise!

community.name: Avatelier - Sinrith Studios
community.description: Sinrith Studio's is a cozy avatar brand featuring kemonomimi avatars - Avatelier is a new community, centered around creating and customizing avatars. We aim to learn and grow together, while promoting each other.

community.name: The Synapse
community.description: We are a fun-loving community focusing on weekly VR games and events. Along with games and events, we emphasize art and media creation, support for artists, manga development, and community fundraising and charities. The Synapse aims to be the community guides of VRChat, providing an amazing and friendly place for people to hangout and be themselves.
